entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #61859
  • Perf regression: json #61858
  • Use "Performance" instead of "Perf" in new Blazor WebAssembly diagnostics APIs and MSBuild properties #61845
  • `WebApplicationFactory.HttpClient` throws ` Flush was canceled on underlying PipeWriter` during test #61844

Closed

  • 📝 Issue: Native model binding support for mixed multipart/form-data and JSON payloads #61856
  • Perf regression: caching #61829
  • Perf improvement: json #61847
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #61848
  • Blazor stop executing the code just saving a IBrowserFile with a MemoryStream #61564

PullRequests

Created

  • Mark validations info related types are experimental #61862
    area-minimal, feature-validation
  • Implemented the JWT Token refresh logic through the OpenIdConnectHandler #61861
    area-auth
  • Use Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref version in place of legacy MicrosoftNETCoreAppPackageVersion #61860
    area-infrastructure
  • Tolerate null ValidationContext in validation resolver APIs #61854
    area-networking
  • Upgrade Ubuntu VMs #61853
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump dotnet/arcade from 43abe63bfc701d34e6599490a557a74710693410 to d7540e540636883d3d080d087223d28b6b7395ae #61851
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add default implementations for new interface methods in Blazor JS interop #61850
    area-blazor
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #61843
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Enable PublishReadyToRun on LA64 and RV64 #61855
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 10.0-preview5
  • Update helix references #61755
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5
  • Add PublishInstallerBaseVersion back #61852
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5
  • Introduce -productBuild and -sourceBuild switches #61840
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5

Updated

  • Fixed devtools url used for debug with chrome and edge #61813
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • perf: improve allocations in `OwinEnvironment` #58917
    Perf, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Use `Microsoft.DotNet.HotReload.Agent` package #61821
    area-blazor
  • InvalidOperationException when decompressed data exceeds request body size limit #61812
    community-contribution, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-09
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FK dependency ordering wrong when replacing an inline owned entity #36059
  • dotnet test -r linux-x64: Unable to load shared library 'e_sqlite3' or one of its dependencies #36058

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #11502 - Allow to specify constraint name for default values #36060
  • Uncomment tests using optional parameters in LINQ #36057

Merged

  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #36056
  • Merge release/9.0 to release/9.0-staging #36051

Updated

  • Named query filters #36028

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Shell.CurrentState` doesn't match `Shell.CurrentPage` when `Page.NavigatedTo` is called using a relative route #29428
  • DidReceiveRemoteNotification not called on CloudKit changes (iOS) #29427
  • Value attribute isn't valid XAML syntax but doesn't produce error #29422
    Backlog
  • [Windows] KeepScrollOffset Not Working as Expected in CarouselView #29421
    Backlog
  • [Windows] KeepLastItemInView Behavior Not Working as Expected in CarouselView #29420
    Backlog
  • Bug Report: App crashes when drawing text on pointer pressed in GraphicsView (Windows) #29418
    Backlog
  • Initial Errors on code #29417
  • Tooltip Delay and Tooltip Duration Settings #29416
  • [Android] ItemsUpdatingScrollMode in CarouselView Not Working as expected #29415
    Backlog
  • [Android] Loaded event not triggered when navigating back to a previous page #29414
    Backlog
  • App Hangs when Orientation Changes During Photo Taking Using MediaPicker #29413
    Backlog
  • [Windows] CarouselView.Loop property cannot be Dynamically changed #29412
    Backlog
  • [Android] CarouselView.Loop = false causes crash on Android when changed at runtime #29411
    Backlog

Closed

  • App crash after navigating back and forth to a page with many UI elements #24008

PullRequests

Created

  • Inflight/current #29426
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Dynamic changes #29424
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] - Enabled Test 29402 to Pass on Both CV1 and CV2 Handlers #29423
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for exception thrown when disconnecting page handlers in the Unloaded event while navigating on MacCatalyst and iOS #29410
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview4] [ci] Push metadata rollbacks #29425
  • [iOS] Fixed the App crashes when navigating to a page containing a map more than once #29369
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-map, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Inheriting StatusBar and NavigationBar background colors on modal pages #28568
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-modal, .NET 9 SR8
  • Revert "[Android][NET 10] Fix: Ensure Image consumes touches properly #29363
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview4] Revert "[Android][NET 10] Fix: Ensure Image consumes touches properly #29419
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky test(ListViewViewCellBinding) in CI #29409
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview4] Revert "Remove InternalsVisibleTo for Toolkit" #29403
    .NET 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • [.Net10][Proposal]TabbedPage.PopToRootOnTabReselect property #28563
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, .NET 10 Planning
  • [.Net10][Proposal][Shell] Shell.PopToRootOnTabReselect property #28562
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 10 Planning
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Optimize JS escaping #27528
    community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • [iOS] CollectionView2 - empty view - improvements2 #29154
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • Fixed a NullReferenceException when starting application with empty shell on Windows #28879
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed issue where group Header/Footer template was set to all items when IsGrouped was true for an ObservableCollection #29144
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed NullReferenceException when using x:Name with SolidColorBrush #28805
    area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR8
  • Fix ScrollToPosition.Center behavior in ScrollView on iOS and MacCatalyst #26825
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • Android Libraries Ecosystem Updates 20250502 #29331
  • Changes in provisioning to fix fails installing Appium on Linux #29105
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Publish new snapshots and diffs to a specific artifacts folder #27928

    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Go to definition" goes to incorrect function in SourceLinks/disassembled sources #78533
  • [RuntimeAsync] EH miscompile #78529
  • CSharpRemoveUnusedVariableCodeFixProvider crashes if unused variable value is set in an if statement with no braces #78528

Closed

  • Spread operation throws exception in .NET 9 #78506
  • IDE0200: "Lambda expression can be removed" suggests removing `ConfigureAwait(false)`. #77341
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-10608.149 #78531
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10608.57 #78524

PullRequests

Created

  • Cache extension method import info per project ID #78542
    Area-IDE, VSCode
  • Document more steps in our C# release process #78539
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix checked/unchecked pair matching for extension unary operators during consumption #78538
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything
  • Add VB ref assembly to semantic search #78537
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update AnalyzerConfig.cs s_propertyMatcherPattern regex key refactorization #78530
    Area-Analyzers, Community, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #78527
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cancel running requests when the connection terminates #78525
    Area-IDE, VSCode

Merged

  • Extensions: only count extensions for determining identifier #78523
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Next
  • Collect data about which code fixes end up making changes that conflict with other code fixes #78540
    Area-IDE, VSCode, Next
  • Extract helper to make it easier for other features to request copilot analysis #78541
    Area-IDE, VSCode, Next
  • Source package fixes #78534
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix test helper message to avoid NRE #78532
    Area-IDE, VSCode, Next
  • Fix information logs getting logged as debug in VSCode #78522
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Switch MethodImplAttributes.Async to 0x2000 #78536
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Shorten log category name #78526
    Area-Infrastructure, VSCode, Next
  • Switch to simple primary constructors for several DI types. #78513
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [release/dev17.14] Switch to non-scouting queue to unblock CI #78535
  • Switch to non-scouting queue to unblock CI #78521
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Support consumption of unary extension operators. #78499
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Extensions: handle extensions in VB SymbolDisplay #78512
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Next
  • Don't unnecessarily create a document when only the document state is needed #78463
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Fix crash in 'introduce variable' on top-level statements #78507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move to the platform's implementation of the BackgroundWorkIndicator service. #78473
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • File based programs IDE support #78488
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: pattern-based constructs #78480
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Fix go to definition for conversions on invalid constructor overloads #78514
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Extensions: analyzer actions #78319
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Backport copilot text change analysis to 17.14 #78498
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update AnalyzerConfig.cs s_propertyMatcherPattern regex key #78459
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Extensions package #78388
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move NullAsynchronousOperationListenerProvider to source package #77187
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move tests to NetLatest #78453
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection arguments: binding for interface target types #78436
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Hot Reload: Handle document deletes #78516
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement PDG.WithProjectsRemoved #78428
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update GetFirstRelatedDocumentId to not return documents with the same path within the same project #78475
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Selectively persist the commandline to temporary storage #78441
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Introduce -productBuild and -sourceBuild switches #78519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unset CompilerType from Csc #78483
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Gracefully handle span mapping failing #78520
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regex: Backreferences should not ignore lookahead/lookbehind assertions #115439
  • Segmentation fault due to a wrongly mapped page after NRE by bootstraping the runtime with rust under linux #115438
    10.0.0
  • Tar timestamp handling followup #115434
    10.0.0
  • Native Aot warning in Spectre.Console using DynamicallyAccessedMembers on a delegate parameter #115431
  • [WASI] add --no-wasm-opt to fix -03 Cmake failure #115430
    10.0.0
  • R2R + Jit issue when inlining intrinsic methods #115429
  • Failing Mono test when `Assembly.GetCallingAssembly()` is used #115425
  • System.Data.Odbc does not support Time or DateTimeOffset data types #115424
  • private provider not correctly initialized when starting process after etw session is started #115420
  • What is the recommended way to register a 3rd party CodeDomProvider #115419
  • DynamicExpression Inconsistency With .Net Framework's ExpressionVisitor #115417

Closed

  • Investigate usage of whole-archive in DAC #115316
    10.0.0
  • [question] bcl between different instruction package like Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.win-x64 and Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.win-x86 #62953
    Future
  • pin.exe does not work with latest windows update #113430
    10.0.0
  • Improve LSRA to handle more than 64 registers for x64 #112959
    10.0.0
  • [.NET 10 Preview 1] System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive produces subtly incorrect zip headers #112017
    10.0.0
  • XmlSerializer does not respect member type specified in XmlElement attribute when DynamicCodeSupport is false #108432
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: SVE AddRotateComplex should use an enum #114685
  • Suggest using ZipArchiveMode.Create when compressing files without modifying their ZipArchivEntry objects #35815

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement new ComWrappers.CreateObject API #115437
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocked
  • Unwrap RCWs that are passed to Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject when using the global marshalling ComWrappers instance #115436
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocked
  • Expose IsDense, HasAnyDenseDimensions, and ToDenseTensor #115435
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [cDAC] Implement contract APIs for x86 stack walking #115433
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Fix issues found when running full SOS test suite #115432
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add SVE2 API skeleton and implement BitwiseClearXor #115428
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [browser] Emscripten bump 4.0.5 #115427
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Cleanup of System.Data label notification #115421
    area-System.Data

Merged

  • [mono] Exclude 32bit more #115426
    needs-area-label
  • Delete --whole-archive linking in libmscordaccore.so #115418
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [8.0] Fix line endings #115414
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [9.0] Fix line endings #115413
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Convert Sync RemoteExecutors to Async on Http Tests #115422
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Build packs subset on community platforms in CI #115423
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix format #115416
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #115395
    area-codeflow
  • Enable SVE2 instruction set detection for ARM64 #115117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add UrlFormat to PQC Experimental attribute #115412
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Fix documentation mistakes in MLKem and MLKemAlgorithm #115368
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Add Azure Linux to regular CI #115415
    area-Infrastructure
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    tenet-performance, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Convert genRuntimeEventSources to a C# source generator #114810
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Improve Math.BigMul to fix Decimal compare perf regression #115182
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2705989 #115228
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Smaller funclet prologs/epilogs (x64) #115284
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Add CPUID for AvxVnniInt8 and AvxVnniInt16 #113956
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add long/ulong->float cast helpers #114597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException thrown on a retrieval of derived attribute with overridden property getter #110945
    area-System.Reflection, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [WIP][Linux][EventPipe][UserEvents] Add user events eventpipe support #115265
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Signed CMS for SLH-DSA #115310
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Tar: Refine GNU timestamp handling #115211
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [browser] runtimeConfig via boot config #115113
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Make the dotnet/runtime official build an assetless build #115311
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • Add custom exception handlers to generated COM wrappers #114828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm coreclr] Make clr.runtime+libs build on Windows #115058
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, Future
  • [release/9.0] Fix edge cases in Tarjan GC bridge (Android) #114682
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, os-android, area-GC-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Introduce Zbs #115335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Improve startup perf by avoiding JIT when invoking well-known signatures #115345
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • [Android] Run CoreCLR library tests on Android #114148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Remove always searching executable directory for native libraries in single-file applications #115236
    breaking-change, area-Single-File, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • Add pattern matching for SVE intrinsics that operate on mask operands #114438
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [APX] Follow up on #104637: rename extended registers and bug fixes. #114713
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: escape analysis for object fields #115388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Write barrier without any RWX pages #114982
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] Remove custom cache #114901
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Consolidate QueryPerformanceCounter/GetTickCount usages to minipal/time.h #115408
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use AssemblyLoadContext-aware caches in TypeDescriptor to support unloading of assemblies cached by TypeDescriptor #114619
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Link peer's X509 stack handle to parent SSL safe handle #115379
  • [release/9.0-staging] Link peer's X509 stack handle to parent SSL safe handle #115380
  • [RISC-V] Optimize `emitLoadImmediate` further #115298
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • HybridCache: add net10 HybridCache zero-alloc fetch API #114427
    api-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Implementation for `UnsafeAccessorTypeAttribute` #114881
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Add APIs to `BlobBuilder` for customizing the underlying byte array et al. #115294
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add morphing to LE_UN/GT_UN(expr, uint.MaxValue) (dotnet#76525) #113037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][jiterp] Implement i64 jiterp shuffle and simplify logic #115344
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [dotnet run] No way to ignore arguments specified in launch profile #45832
    9.0.2xx
  • Unable to build .NET 9 Android Maui app when targeting non default architectures #48890
  • [10.0 Preview 4 VMR build] In Debian OS, after installing tar.gz package, the command line dotnet--info does not display sdk/runtime/templates #48514

Updated

  • CanIgnoreTemplateGroupsWithConstraints flaky test failing in CI #46212
  • dotnet watch - Failure in DeleteSubfolder test with polling #46454
  • aspnetcore build failure - Child node 7 exited prematurely #46398
  • [dotnet watch] Cannot open project Lib.fsproj because extension fsproj is not associated with a language #46378
  • Build failure in VMR Vertical Build Windows_x64: Downloading vswhere - Process cannot access sdk.txt because it is being used by another process #45809
